## Basic Map

```{r}
#| echo: false
library(leaflet)
# Create a basic map of New Zealand
nz_map <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  setView(lng = 174.8860, lat = -40.9006, zoom = 5)  # Coordinates of New Zealand
nz_map

```

The `echo: false` option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).
